OOC: @#^@%^$#

::Chaostaur::
    He stops firing and looks at Zardus.  "Finally, someone sane.  I 
didn't really want to attack the base.  I just wanted to attack 
something.  Your idiotic subordinate opened fire on me instead of 
giving me a beter target.  Now then, can I get out of the water?"
